mapper.select: select max(fid) as fid_max from notice
select * from notice where gongji=#{gongji} order by fid desc, thread asc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
mapper.update: update notice set gongji=#{gongji}, subject=#{subject},comment=#{comment},file1=#{file1},faq_type=#{faq_type} where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select right(thread,1) as thread_right from notice where fid=#{fid} and length(thread)=length(#{thread})+1 and locate(#{thread},thread)=1 order by thread desc limit 1
mapper.update: update notice set status='답변완료' where fid=#{fid}
